author: Victor Ferreira
title: Portfolio managers see light at end of coronavirus tunnel, but markets remain volatile
description: Dow, TSX strive to loosen shackles of fear but get pulled back
content:
With each passing week, Canadian portfolio managers are growing more and more optimistic that the worst may be behind them.
Two weeks ago, a massive rally that followed the passing of a US$2 trillion stimulus package was met with caution. That upward movemen… [+3420 chars]
